title: Having resolution issues
body:
For reference
http://imgur.com/a/sSLvm
Context: the screenshots aren't showing exactly what i was seeing, but the second one the name is all the way to the left, and my screen is huge and the game looks muddy in comparison to the first one where it looks clean and everything is the correct size. **Edit: guess it got reversed, but the first screenshot is the fucked up one**

So i load into the game it starts me out in windowed 1080x800 i believe, and when i change it to fullscreen  1768x992, the name floats off and the game looks muddy and sometimes with other resolutions my calibration isn't right, where my mouse click is miles off in another direction. Such as clicking ok i have to hover my mouse over very high

Can anyone help me? This started after the windows update today i tried going back to a previous build but its still not working i do not know what fucked it up


I have tried changing the sizes from the right click on desktop but it doesn't do anything

replies.body:
Did you recently update windows?  Resolutions became awkward for a few players, but there is a fix that may help you out by adjusting your scaling:

Right click the LoL icon -> Properties -> Compatibility Tab -> Check the "Disable Display Scaling on High DPI Settings" Box.

Hopefully, this will do the trick!
